name: Dorabase: Doraemon Super Baseball Gaiden: Dramatic Stadium
overview: Dorabase: Dramatic Stadium is a Nintendo DS game released and published by Namco Bandai Games (Now Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 2007. It is the first Doraemon game to be based on the baseball spin-off manga Dorabase. It was developed by FamiSta team, the developer behind the R.B.I Baseball video game franchise.
